Package jhave.client

Class Summary
AboutDialog A dialog that displays information about the JHAVE project as well as the client.
Client The main client GUI for the JHAVE Project.
ClientProperties This is a wrapper class for a properties file.
ConnectionPanel JPanel that displays a log of the connections between the client and server.
ControlPanel  
InputGenerator Modifications by Andrew Jungwirth and TLN to allow XML-defined input generators based on input_panel.dtd
LoginDialog A dialog that displays a username and password field so the user can login to the JHave server.
LoginPanel JPanel that displays an area for a username and password that can then be used by another class to login to the server.
QuizInfo This class stores data for quizzes and formats them as an XML string.
SetupPanel The initial pages that is displayed when the JHave client is loaded.
SplashScreen Splash screen that comes up while initial information is being loaded.
VisualizerLoader
